data.comment: The big names in today's match at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium have now been confirmed.
In the minute 40, Marc Roberts scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
The first-half is over at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Dennis Adeniran with Anis Mehmeti.
Riley McGree is replacing Gary Gardner for the home team.
Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a second substitution, with Fred Onyedinma replacing David Wheeler.
In the minute 75, Scott Kashket levels the score at 1-1.
Aitor Karanka is making the team's second substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Jonathan Leko replacing Ivan Sanchez.
That's full-time at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium. The final score is 1-2.
Goal! Wycombe have taken a 1-2 lead courtesy of a header from Fred Onyedinma.
